title: Patch
desc: Patch Number of Game

title: Week/Day
desc: Week/Date of game, (i.e.: 'W1D1')

title: Show Team Record or Wins
desc: Use team record or wins in the top bar

title: Item Callout Delay
desc: Minimum time between Item Callouts

title: Champ Select Stats Subline
desc: Source info for Champ Select Stats

title: Default L3 Title
desc: Title when no Lower 3rds are visible, typically name of tournament or stage

title: Damage Bar Chart L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Damage Chart

title: Whole Game Damage Bar Chart L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Damage Chart in Whole Game Mode

title: Default Time Window
desc: Default to last X seconds

title: Gold Bar Chart L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Gold Chart

title: Gold Bar Chart L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Gold Chart

title: Default Time Window
desc: Default to last X seconds

title: Live Gold Area Chart L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Live Gold Area Chart

title: Whole Game Gold Area Chart L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Whole Game Gold Area Chart

title: Player Matchup L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Player Matchup L3.  Use $left_player and $right_player as variables i.e. $left_player vs $right_player or $LEFT_PLAYER VS $RIGHT_PLAYER

title: Player Stats L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Player Stats L3.  Use $player as variable i.e. $player Stats

title: Player Runes L3 Title
desc: Default Title for Player Runes L3.  Use $player as variable i.e. $player Runes

title: Gold Side Slab Title
desc: Default Title for Gold Side Slab

title: Special Baron Announcement Duration
desc: How long to play Special Baron Announcement animation

title: Dragon Soul Duration
desc: How long to play Dragon Soul animation

title: Mythic Item Duration
desc: How long to play Mythic Item animation

title: Test mode
desc: Use pre-stored data.  Requires Restart

title: Record mode
desc: Record Champ Select Data.  Requires Restart

title: Champ Select Dev Mode
desc: Use a pre-set password and port for Champ Select (developer / 9090).  Requires Restart
